name: A Giant Leap
description:
On a dying planet the last remnant of humanity linger, still clinging to hope for salvation among the stars.

Brian Kistler

Declan Blasini

Jeremy Marsh

Tatum Kirchner

Vinicius Vella

WSAD - Move

ESC - Pause

X - Interact

C - Crouch

Objective - Find the rocket parts and put them in the bin to fix your ship.
